mapper.select:
select c.commentId, c.content, a.title as articleTitle, u.userName, c.hidden, c.createTime from Comment c left join Article a on a.articleId = c.articleId left join UserInfo u on u.userId = c.userId
and c.content like concat('%', #{content}, '%')
and a.title like concat('%', #{articleTitle}, '%')
and u.userName like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by c.createTime desc

select c.commentId, c.content, u.userName, c.hidden, c.createTime from Comment c left join UserInfo u on u.userId = c.userId where c.articleId = #{articleId} and c.hidden = 0 order by c.createTime asc
mapper.insert: insert into Comment(commentId, articleId, userId, content, hidden, createTime) values(#{commentId}, #{articleId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{hidden}, #{createTime})
